Entity.name: fw_rm_disposal_schedule
Entity.doc: Schedule by which records are retained for a specified period of time followed by their planned disposal

Attribute.name: uuid
Attribute.doc: Universally unique identifier for an entity

Attribute.name: name
Attribute.doc: The identifying name or title of the entity [moreq:title]

Attribute.name: description
Attribute.doc: Description of the entity

Attribute.name: mandate
Attribute.doc: Textual reference to a legal or other instrument that provides the authority for a disposal schedule or a disposal hold

Attribute.name: id_action_code
Attribute.doc: Code describing the action to be taken on disposal of the record

Attribute.name: id_action_interval_code
Attribute.doc: Unit of measurement of time as either days, weeks, months or years

Attribute.name: action_duration
Attribute.doc: Number of days or weeks specified for performing the action

Attribute.name: id_retention_trigger_code
Attribute.doc: The specific conditions required for triggering the start of the retention period for a record

Attribute.name: id_retention_interval_code
Attribute.doc: Unit of measurement of time as either days, weeks, months or years

Attribute.name: retention_duration
Attribute.doc: Numbers of days, months or years specified for retaining a record

Attribute.name: id_confirmation_interval_code
Attribute.doc: Unit of measurement of time as either days or weeks

Attribute.name: confirmation_duration
Attribute.doc: Number of days or weeks allowed for confirming the disposal of record

Attribute.name: interval_justification
Attribute.doc: The disposal justification

Attribute.name: action_justification
Attribute.doc: The disposal action justification

Attribute.name: _action_name_childs
Attribute.doc: Automatic - the childs actions concatenated

Attribute.name: _action_interval_childs
Attribute.doc: Automatic - the childs actions interval concatenated

Attribute.name: order
Attribute.doc: A value used for determining the order in which items should be logically presented

Attribute.name: is_modifiable
Attribute.doc: Flag indicating whether a metadata is modifiable by users

Attribute.name: data_type
Attribute.doc: XML datatype definition giving the precise format required for the value of a system or contextual metadata

Attribute.name: default_value
Attribute.doc: The default value for a metadata when it's first applied to an entity

Attribute.name: retain_on_hold
Attribute.doc: Flag that indicates whether an event or a metadata should be deleted when the entity it belongs to is destroyed

Entity.name: fw_rm_aggregation
Entity.doc: Aggregation of individual records or higher level aggregation of aggregations of records

Attribute.name: uuid
Attribute.doc: Universally unique identifier for an entity

Attribute.name: last_addition
Attribute.doc: System set date and time indicating when the most recent record or child aggregation was added to the parent aggregation

Attribute.name: aggregated
Attribute.doc: System set date and time when this child aggregation was created in, or added to, its current aggregation

Attribute.name: id_class
Attribute.doc: The classification of the entity, used by child aggregations and records to override the class they inherit from their parent aggregation

Attribute.name: name
Attribute.doc: The identifying name or title of the entity [moreq:title]

Attribute.name: description
Attribute.doc: Description of the entity

Attribute.name: closed
Attribute.doc: System set date and time when the aggregation was closed

Attribute.name: id_parent
Attribute.doc: The parent aggregation for a child aggregation or record

Attribute.name: tree_path
Attribute.doc: Full path to this child in the tree

Attribute.name: tree_level
Attribute.doc: Level of this child in the tree

Entity.name: fw_rm_record
Entity.doc: Record made up of one or more components

Attribute.name: uuid
Attribute.doc: Universally unique identifier for an entity

Attribute.name: name
Attribute.doc: The identifying name or title of the entity [moreq:title]

Attribute.name: description
Attribute.doc: Description of the entity

Attribute.name: id_class
Attribute.doc: The classification of the entity, used by child aggregations and records to override the class they inherit from their parent aggregation

Attribute.name: id_disposal_schedule
Attribute.doc: id of the disposal schedule

Attribute.name: transferred
Attribute.doc: System set date and time indicating when the transfer of the record was confirmed

Attribute.name: retention_date
Attribute.doc: System generated date calculated from the record's disposal schedule

Attribute.name: disposal_due_date
Attribute.doc: The calculated date that the record is due for disposal

Attribute.name: disposal_confirmation_date
Attribute.doc: The calculated date by which confirmation of carrying out the disposal action is due

Attribute.name: disposal_alert_date
Attribute.doc: System set date and time when an alert was sent because the record was overdue for disposal

Attribute.name: disposal_last_review_comment
Attribute.doc: Comment made by the user who last reviewed the record regarding the disposal decision

Attribute.name: disposal_last_review_date
Attribute.doc: System set date and time of when the last review was completed

Attribute.name: last_xml
Attribute.doc: The xml containing the metadata of the record

Attribute.name: is_archived
Attribute.doc: Flag identifying if the record has been completely processed and archived

Attribute.name: is_final
Attribute.doc: Flag that indicates whether or not a record is temporary

Attribute.name: id_wf_instance
Attribute.doc: id of the workflow instance
